column1: Renew support to get access to recent releases
column2: Please renew the subscription to get the latest module versions: https://argentotheme.com/knowledgebase/faq/how-to-renew-your-argento-subscription

Please check the documentation to add the Custom Argento Child theme:
http://docs.swissuplabs.com/m2/argento/customization/custom-theme/

column1: In case of problems using `bin/magento marketplace:package:require swissup/argento-m2` command
column2:
Try pulling theme or module with `composer require`

Example: `composer require swissup/argento-m2`
Try running this command `composer update swissup/argento-m2 --with-all-dependencies`

When Marketplace module is installed you can proceed with update using the following command:
`bin/magento marketplace:package:update swissup/argento-m2`

column1: Error: Required parameter `theme_dir` was not passed
How to remove Argento all designs except one

column2:
Check the Argento built-in Swissup Pagespeed instructions:
https://docs.swissuplabs.com/m2/extensions/pagespeed/quickstart/
